subject: Baseball
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: The Yankees’ lineup is built to excel in the Bronx, with a short right field that rewards left-handed sluggers, but the team’s hitters again struggled on the road in a loss to Minnesota.
snippet: The Yankees’ lineup is built to excel in the Bronx, with a short right field that rewards left-handed sluggers, but the team’s hitters again struggled on the road in a loss to Minnesota.
